<style>

*{
  margin: 0px;
  padding: 0px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

nav {
  width: 100%;
  height: 70px;
  line-height: 70px;
  padding: 0x 100px;
  position: fixed;  
  background-image: linear-gradient(#033747, #012733);
}

nav .logo p {
  font-size: 30px;
  font-weight: bold;
  float: left;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: white;
  letter-spacing: 1.5px;
  padding: 0px 30px;
}

nav li {
  display: inline-block;
  list-style: none;
}

nav ul {
  float: right;
} 

nav ul a {
  font-size: 14px;
  color: white;
  padding: 0px 10px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  text-decoration: none;
}

nav ul a:hover {
  color: #ff8c69;
  transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
}

div img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 60vh;
  background-position: center;
  background-size: cover;
  border-radius: 4px;
}

.img_container {
  position: relative;
}

.city-search-menu {
  position: absolute;
  font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  left: 27rem;
  bottom: 5rem;
  background-color: white;
  padding: 0px 30px;
  border-radius: 5px;

}

</style>
